name: D.I.Y. Pet Care zine
description: A guide for taking care of your best friend. Cassidy talks about commercial pet foods and why they are bad for your dog(s). Lists foods that you should feed your animal and how much. She discusses feeding your animal meat products while being vegan and information on vegan/vegetarian diet for your pet. Includes other topics like how “Vaccination can actually decrease immunity”, bag foods that are ok for your pet and remedies for problems that your pet may experience like allergies, arthritis, ear problems, etc.
